    • clear

      public void clear()
      Removes all expectation configuration, but does not modify global encoders or decoders.

    • request

      public Request request(HttpMethod method, PathMatcher pathMatcher, Consumer<Request> consumer)
      Description copied from interface: Expectations
      Allows configuration of request expectation matching any request method with a path matching the provided matcher. The consumer will be used to provide addition expectations on the request.
      Specified by:
      request in interface Expectations
      Parameters:
      method - the request method
      pathMatcher - the patch matcher
      consumer - the configuration consumer
      Returns:
      a Request configuration object

    • DELETE

      public Request DELETE(PathMatcher pathMatcher, Consumer<Request> config)
      Description copied from interface: DeleteExpectations
      Allows configuration of a DELETE request expectation using the provided Consumer<Request>. The Consumer<Request> will have an instance of Request passed into it for configuration.
      Specified by:
      DELETE in interface DeleteExpectations
      Parameters:
      pathMatcher - the path matcher
      config - the configuration consumer
      Returns:

    • findMatch

      public Optional<Request> findMatch(ClientRequest clientRequest)
      Used to find a request matching the given incoming client request. The first match will be returned.
      Parameters:
      clientRequest - the incoming client request
      Returns:
      the matching request expectation

    • getRequests

      public List<Request> getRequests()
      Retrieves an immutable list of the stored request expectations.
      Returns:
      the list of request expectations

    • verify

      public boolean verify(long timeout, TimeUnit unit)
      Used to verify that all request expectations have been called the expected number of times.

      This method will block until the call count expectations are met or the timeout expires.

      Parameters:
      timeout - the amount of time to wait in the specified units
      unit - the timeout unit to be used
      Returns:
      a value of true if all requests are verified

    • verify

      public boolean verify(long timeout)
      Used to verify that all request expectations have been called the expected number of times.

      This method will block until the call count expectations are met or the timeout expires.

      Parameters:
      timeout - the amount of time to wait (in seconds)
      Returns:
      a value of true if all requests are verified

    • verify

      public boolean verify()
      Used to verify that all request expectations have been called the expected number of times. This method will block until the call count expectations are met or the timeout (1 second) expires.
      Returns:
      a value of true if all requests are verified
